body: Get that daughter in child support pronto.

Wholeshome shit is wholesome. It was so wholesome to the point I didn't even nutted. Art is way above average. As simple it might be, the way it was narrated is spot on for you not feel bad even if MC got cuckholded by chad guy and bitch wife... overall I give this doujinshi an 8.5-10 Nighties.
I still want an after chapter to see what happened to his bitchy ex-wife, kid, and that wannabe musician. They probably got the bad ending
Truly a diamond in the rough, only thing I regret is that it didn't have the NTR tag so I could find this even sooner.

NTR is only good in contexts like these, the "I found out my spouse was cheating on me (and our kid isn't even mine)" scenarios. wholesome cheating lifts the spirits. also I hope he divorces and sues them and the musician loses all job prospects. The girl was just raised by bad people, so I hope she gets put in child support and adopted by good people.

This is really hidden gem.
So wholesome to the point its really melt my heart
Goods Haven! Reading this while enjoying a nice cup of Tea with Crumpets is Spleendid!
It's really a good one!
What a hidden gem
Good for you MC, you got a young girl to replace your bitchy wife
Wholesome as hell fuck im crying

I like to see NTR when the good people who got cheated on get a good ending like they move on and find happiness with some else and the cheating ex gets a bad ending. that's the kind of NTR i wouldn't mind reading.
BTW I still want to know what happened to the mother and daughter
Just look at the daughter's hair, and I knew he was in big trouble. Glad he got the good ending and i can't wait to see the WIFE's life.

better yet he should reconcile with his friend he had the fight with and then the friend tells him that his ex wife and daughter are living a shitty life because that musician either didn't amount to shit or he just straight up left them

I wanted to see what happened to that cheating bitch ex wife and daughter personally. Because that musician probably didn't amount to shit and she tryin to get back with the man she cheated on but togura just kicked her and the baby to the curb. Seeing that would be so satisfying
Man I feel bad for that kid too. She’s going to grow up thinking what her mother was doing was right
Man I feel bad for that like too. She’s going to grow up thinking what her mother was doing was right
I never fap with this,but always comeback for the story. Its pretty good you know
this is the only type of ntr i like, where the person that was cheated on finds the right person that loves him and plus that girl is way hotter and more loyal then his bitch of a ex wife

Judging by the 1st ending, i think he sued his wife or most likely a divorce, looking at his reaction. I don't he took thst easily, he probably won it, took dna from the kid turns true for the musician, damaged his career cause of that and is always out on business trip, won't be surprise if he replaces the cheater, pretty good.
Can I ask if there is anymore like this? I mean the MC gets ntred by his woman and founds another one who is much more worthy..
this is so good 10/10 fuck his ex love the ending

Title should have been "Fake family -  True family". Imperfect x Perfect not only makes it sound like the MC was truly considered part of a family (he wasn't), but also sets an impossible goal (perfection) for human relatioships.

That said I enjoyed this work so far!
